name: Abidance
description:
You are a crash landed Space Marine on the unknown planet. Your goal is to survive approx 5 nights until the rescue will arrive. The planet you are on is quite unusual - there is barely any light on it during day time and complete darkness during night. There is no life on the planet other than some sort of entity living in the shadow - hunting you whenever you are in darkness. It’s afraid of light. Keep to the light to survive.

Explore. Loot. Light. Survive.

!!! BEST PLAYED IN WINDOW @ 1024x768 !!!

HELP

WSAD - Move player

F - Flashlight ON/OFF

E - Open loot crates / Interact

Q - Use Med-Kit

Mouse - aim / look

LMB - Shoot laser

CHEATS

SHIFT + 1 >>> Adds few resources

SHIFT + 2 >>> Adds one day to the current time

Search for loot crates for different resources - survive until the rescue will arrive.

Flashlight scares off the Shadow entity.

Shooting it with laser will not kill it but it will scare it off for a while.

The only TRUE protection is the light next to the ship wreck - it will last approx 12 hours and uses 5 batteries.
